title: VineVolumeFixer
name: vinevolumefixer
description: Adjusts vine video volume to a normal level and adds volume controls
author: Michael Wallace

preferences.name: defaultvolume
preferences.title: Default Volume Level
preferences.description: Set all vines to this volume when loaded

preferences.name: unmute
preferences.title: Unmute Videos
preferences.description: Unmute videos on start (vine default is muted)
